**Tinbergen Institute** (Graduate School and Research Institute for Economics and Business) **Location** üìç Gustav Mahlerplein 117, 1082 MS Amsterdam, The Netherlands. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: :::
::: :::{.paper-main-column} ::: {.cell} ::: :::{.justify} The 14th Dutch Development Economics Network (DuDE) Workshop was hosted by the Tinbergen Institute, in Amsterdam. Chaired by [Marc Witte](https://www.marcwitte.com/), the event took place on 27 and 28 March 2025 and included various academic and social activities, among which paper presentations, social lunches and dinner, and poster presentations. For a detailed version of the full itinerary, please download the [workshop program](program.pdf). **Posters** Feel free to download the posters from the 14th iteration of the DuDE Workshop. ::: {.grid} :::{.card} [![Non-Random Locations of Random Trials?](posters/poster1-thumb.jpg){.img-thumbnail}](posters/poster1_anna.pdf) **Anna Minasyan** *Groningen University* ::: :::{.card} [![Worker performance and In-Group Bias: Evidence from Chinese firms in Zambia](posters/poster2-thumb.jpg){.img-thumbnail}](posters/poster2_kacana.pdf) **Kacana Sipangule Khadjavi** *VU Amsterdam* ::: :::{.card} [![Reforms Welcome?](posters/poster4-thumb.jpg){.img-thumbnail}](posters/poster4_tobias.pdf) **Tobias Hillebrand** *UNU-MERIT* ::: :::{.card} [![Weathering Conflict: The Effect of Resource Shocks on Livestock Raids](posters/poster5-thumb.jpg){.img-thumbnail}](posters/poster5_rikken.pdf) **Emma E. Rikken** *Wageningen University* ::: :::{.card} [![Empowering Female Leaders in Group Lending](posters/poster6-thumb.jpg){.img-thumbnail}](posters/poster6_seimel.pdf) **Nat√°lia Seimel** *Tilburg University* ::: :::{.card} [![Decoding Green Justice: AI-Assisted Analysis of Environmental Court Rulings in India](posters/poster3-thumb.jpg){.img-thumbnail}](posters/poster3_kyrychenko.pdf) **Olexiy Kyrychenko** *Radboud University* ::: ::: ::: ::: :::
